languages.text: "Как Глейто? Вы снова действуете как одно целое?"
"How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"
languages.original_text: "Как Глейто? Вы снова действуете как одно целое?"

traits.locale_text: "How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"
"How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"
"How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"
"How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"
"How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"
"How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"

languages.text: 「グライトの様子はどうだ？君たちはまた一心同体のように動いているのか？」
languages.original_text: "How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"

traits.locale_text: 「グライトの様子はどうだ？君たちはまた一心同体のように動いているのか？」

languages.text: "Wie geht es Glaito? Seid Ihr beide wieder eine Einheit?"
languages.original_text: "How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie geht es Glaito? Seid Ihr beide wieder eine Einheit?"

languages.text: « Comment va Glaito ? Avez-vous retrouvé votre complicité ? »
languages.original_text: "How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment va Glaito ? Avez-vous retrouvé votre complicité ? »

languages.text: «¿Cómo está Glaito? ¿Por fin vuelven a actuar los dos como uno solo?».
languages.original_text: "How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo está Glaito? ¿Por fin vuelven a actuar los dos como uno solo?».

languages.text: “格雷托怎么样了？你们重新心意相通了吗？”
languages.original_text: "How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"

traits.locale_text: “格雷托怎么样了？你们重新心意相通了吗？”

languages.text: "Glaito nasıl? İkiniz yine tek vücut gibi hareket ediyorsunuz, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "How is Glaito? Do you two act as one again?"

traits.locale_text: "Glaito nasıl? İkiniz yine tek vücut gibi hareket ediyorsunuz, değil mi?"
